[[File:Lizard_Portrait.png|255px|thumb|right|Vliss Greybone's in-game portrait]]Vliss Greybone is a lizard [[Trader]] and Lorekeeper of the Vanguard of the Stolen Keys.

She is the third Trader you can unlock by leveling, at [[Level]] 9. Vliss Greybone can't come to your settlement before you hit 33 City score.
